channel.title: chat on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in chat on Barefoot Rob

item.title: great chat with Joel
item.description: 15:51 Monday 01 October 2018 JST I met Joel for lunch in Roppongi today. Ate at a falafel cafe near Almond. It was vegan delicious! Great to catch up with him and share stories about how we are doing in Tokyo!

item.title: s k
item.description: 20:59 Saturday 01 October 2016 JST S K called me tonight; great to chat with him. He’s introspective as always. Said that CPC is apparently no longer doing trials.
